articles.author: Elsa Keslassy
articles.title: Max to Launch in First European Countries in May Ahead of Olympics; Unveils Basic Ad Plan and Sports Add-On - Variety
articles.description: Warner Bros. Discovery has set the launch date for Max across the first 20 European countries as May 21.
articles.content: In one of the most anticipated keynotes at Series Mania Festival, JB Perrette, president/CEO of global streaming and games at Warner Bros. Discovery, dropped the launch date for Max across the first … [+2641 chars]

articles.author: Tom Skinner
articles.title: Michael Jackson's son files legal injunction against his grandmother - NME
articles.description: Michael Jackson's son Blanket has filed a legal injunction against his grandmother, Katherine, it has been reported.
articles.content:
Michael Jackson‘s youngest son Blanket has filed a legal injunction against his grandmother, Katherine.
